page.title: 10LEISURE PURSUITS
page.content: BEING SITUATED MORE OR LESS HALFWAY BETWEEN NORWICH AND GREAT YARMOUTH, THERE MAY AT FIRST SIGHT SEEM LITTLE NEED FOR THE COMMUNITY TO ORGANISE ITS OWN LEISURE OPPORTUNITIES WITHIN THE VILLAGE.BUT THIS POINT OF VIEW NEGLECTS THE CONTRIBUTION THAT CLUBS AND SOCIETIES CAN MAKE TO COMMUNITY SPIRIT.POSSIBLY ONE OF THE MAIN REASONS WHY ACLE IS SUCH A HAPPY PLACE TO LIVE AND WORK IS THAT THE VILLAGERS OFTEN MEET EACH OTHER SOCIALLY.SOME OF THE ACTIVITIES AVAILABLE INCLUDE:W.I, FRIDAY CLUB,CRICKET AND FOOTBALL TEAMS BADMINTON,BELL RINGING,BIRDING CLUBS, ANGLING SOCIETY,ACLE SOCIETY,CUBS ETC FOOTPATH SOCIETY,NORFOLK NATURALISTS TO NAME JUST A FEW.THROUGH MEMBERSHIP OF ONE OR MORE OF THESE,NEWCOMERS ARE USUALLY QUICKLY ABSORBED INTO THE COMMUNITY.
